item_category: HUAWEI MediaPad T5 is a 10.1-inch tablet with a Kirin 659 octa-core processor that comes with an IPS screen with a resolution of 1920 x 1200 pixels. Supporting high-speed Internet connectivity, office work, GPS navigation, and other features, the T5 functions as a smart assistant and entertainment center. The T5 runs Huawei's latest EMUI 8.0 OS, which is developed based on Google Android Oreo.

review_text: Tablet is great thank you
Really good price. Long battery life. Big screen . Cannot find any cheaper then argos. Just paid and collected straight away.
This is great. Have had the Samsung before. I think this is a brilliant alternative. And doesn't lack anything that a Samsung has
Had it a week and it runs perfect easy to use and long battery life

This is absolutely fantastic price. Had ipads all the time but this tablet is better.  The size.  Battery life,all the things you can download. The .memory can even put a extra memory card in.never going back to a iPad
My Dad Love it and its easy for a 83 year old man to work recommended For all
We have bought 2 new phones a new vacuum and other items in the last year and will continue to use argos as we are very satisfied with them

This is a beautiful tablet, slim, light, fast, with an excellent display. Being an Android device, it has full access to all the Android apps. Better than an ipad at a fraction of the cost, a real no-brainer.
Good tablet. I would recommend. Good value for money.

Tablet great value for money
Has a memory card slot for memory expansion

Great tablet for thr price. Superb if you have huawei phone as very easy to sinc. Very happy with thr purchase

Great tablet. Bought for my 8 year old. Runs fine. Easy to use. Perfect for all his games he likes to play.

This tablet has changed the life of a 9yr old child, A friends child... It couldn't have been a better time, with the covid restrictions in place
Many thanks
 It was worth seeing the joy in their eyes xx

Excellent pad for the price. Having the extra memory (3gb compared to others with 2gb) really does make a difference and make things that little more snappy.  I purchased one for my littlen last year, very impressed by it so bought myself one.
  The last model on android (newer models are no longer on android so keep this in mind).
 Plenty of storage space for your general usage and can easily play many new games without issue. Very good specs. Nice to hold and very clear screen.

Good screen resolution and for a tablet in this price range the sound quality is excellent.

Only slight negative is that the touchscreen occasionally is a little laggy to respond, but not that even when this happens it does not cause any problems in using the device.

Excellent value for money.
This tablet is good for daily use, good price

We considered this tablet good value for money. The screen is sharp, bright and clear.
It is light and comfortable to hold. The outer case is attractive.

I can say that the performance of this tablet is very good,very smooth doesn't lag or freeze,videos run smoothly theres no stuttering,pictures quality is vibrant and detailed,gaming is smooth especially games with heavy graphics,sound quality is clear no distortion even on full volume.This tablet is good for the price but it has one major problem and this problem might not be in every tablet and that is it overheats after an hour use.

Bought 2 of these for my sons to help with their lockdown work. Works perfectly and can run the apps they need and even some of their games.

Only problem i have is that when the keyboard appears in landscape mode you can't see the screen at all which is important for school work.
Reasonably easy set up and easy to share with other devices. Battery life is quite good, charging takes roughly 4 hours. Screen size is good and graphics are clear. I am pleased with this tablet.
Nice tablet,  good picture quality. Good  battery life .
Cannot fault this tablet. Best around for the price.
Battery discharging happen fast

does the job
I advise you to get on very good for remote learning at hom thank you .

The tablet is good seemed easy to use, however mine had a crack on the screen when I got it near the camera. I returned it and couldn’t get a replacement as there was none in stock.
I really liked the fact that I could extent the memory.
The tablet has plenty of memory, great for my 9 year old daughter.
I bought this for my husband for Christmas because his old tablet wasn't working properly. He's really pleased with it, it's easy to use & he likes the larger, very responsive screen.
I would recommend this to anyone it’s the best I’ve had great for gaming and everyday use.
The photo is very good
Great little tablet for the price, and looks good too!! Works well and was easy to set up and use. Wife is very happy with it.

Its fairly light and although the UI is different to the Samsung layout once I got my head around it I found it very easy to operate. This tablet would suit anybody regardless of age to visit shopping, banking websites or use for research on the Internet.
Just what I wanted! Excellent! Would highly recommend. Best price.

So much better than the apple, you can do a lot more, transfer everything over, to be honest my hubby and daughter have one each too, I will never go back to apple again,

Being used to film online classes. Easy to use, ideal front-facing camera positioning & brilliant image quality.
very good quality  for the price, it's good for children gaming and my daughter loved it

I chose this to read books on, to organise photos and also as a bedside tablet for the odd evening watch. The 10" Size is excellent - I have a Huawei phone too, and this is essentially just a larger version of that - But aren't most tablets?! Size wise it is excellent - You can easily watch stuff on this, great for taking in the kitchen for TV or just for recipes. One thing, it is quite heavy! Performance is fluid from the 3Gb Ram - worth the extra pounds.
Easy to use, excellent value for money.
A great success, my daughter is enjoying a lot, quality and price in an article !!
Nice design very responsive great battery life good value for money

Its performance and solid feel really makes you feel your getting great value.
Excellent screen quality, long battery life and fast Internet speed makes it a excellent purchase . Not played games on it yet but so far impressed!

Bought two of these for my kids.
Build, quality, design, battery life....everything fantastic!
Would definitely recommend (and at only a third of the price of a low model iPad!

It's irritating that they advertise this as 32gb as the operating system eats up a good 13gb; it means that useably without an SD card you end up with less than 20gb storage. That said for a cheap handy-sized tablet it's a good bit of kit. The screen can sometimes interpret where you rest your hand as input but you soon get used to it. It looks & feels great and on standby the battery lasts forever. Makes my Ipad pro look terribly overpriced! Recommended.
Bought tablet for personal use very happy with the overall performance of unit would recommend it to friends

Ordered one day, collected the next.
Always very happy to shop at Argos
Looking for a tablet and this was great value compared to the Samsung offering which were more expensive.
Good value for money.Works perfectly
Took it camping with films downloaded for the kids. They loved it. Brilliant quality and battery life.

The screen size is nice and very clear
The on/off button is too sensitive

Looked at many tablets and really bogged down with info. Eventually narrowed down to this one for battery life, price and ease of use. Have to say I am more than delighted. Found it easy to use, and is just what I wanted from a tablet.
Very happy with price and quality of product.
Replaced an old ipad. This new tablet is brilliant. Does all I need it to do and the price is right.
Nice product doesn't break the bank.
Lovely Tablet , easy to set up, good large screen which is perfect for playing games.

For the price it's an excellent product.
Performs brilliantly. Only two very minor points stop me giving it 5 stars in every department. The speakers and battery life is not quite as good as my similar spec'd Samsung tablet. However, the Samsung was an extra £50.
Very pleased with this tablet

Quick... no need to push buttons hard soft touch.
Great picture and looks good too.

I have a Huawei phone and needed to upgrade from my ipad.
Was happy with the performance of my phone so decided on this tablet. I'm able to sync the 2 together to share files and saved data. 
Really happy with the performance and quality of the screen. The battery life is great.
Only gripe is the on button is at the bottom close to the volume so I accidentally switch off when altering volume but I'll get used to it.
Have had tablets before but this is by far the best . Ordered late night and collected it early the following morning Argos click and collect brilliant very safe during covid 19.
Great tablet, reasonable price, excellent quality definitely recommend.
Very good tablet , fabulous design and screen quality.
Amazing quality and price
very good quality for the price recomand

Was looking for something for my kids to use to do homework on .... this has a big screen so its clear and easy for kids to control .... it is a bit too big for their little hands but if you got a good cover it'll make it easier to hold.
I purchased 3 in total and my kids really like the screen size and performance.

The mediapad is near instant to fire up, and easy to upload with music and photo files - if one buys a USB "OTG" connector cable. The biggest boon has been the clarity of photos viewed on the screen, and just how easily they can be selected and viewed - ideal for showing relatives and friends. And I would strongly recommend the Huawei for the slick operating system and ease of use.
It comes with games installed on which takes some mem up apart from that it's good the job in need it 4

Bought this for my partner for her birthday. She absolutely loves it and has hardly put it down in the last 2 weeks.
Love this tablet fast streaming loads of aps for me and kids live watching my football on here hd quality.
Replaced a more expensive one but no difference in quality or process
good good thanks I like it

My ipad decided to go to ipad heaven during lockdown with only this ipad as the source of tech for home schooling and sanity. Purchased this huawei not holding out much hope, but would do until all "this" is over.. BUT I solomy swear this tablet is great, found it easy to switch between operation systems, apps work fine, kids can continue to communicate with school.
Camera great, much lighter than the ipad. 
To be honest I think I'm converted. And at a jolly good price too
Just great all round pad!

We ordered it, and was able to collect straight away.  My daughter's laptop broke and so we wanted a quick replacement for her to be able to do homework on and play games.

She absolutely loves it!

Easy to set up, great display, quick for homework and games, easy to use.  

Would recommend and buy again.
Holds charge very well. Great quality
Reasonably priced, quick pick up, good value, excellent for video calling. Recommended

I bought this tablet for my daughter and she loves it. It was easy to set up and has good quality graphics. Would definitely recommend.
The screen size is fabulous also battery capacity is long lasted
Excellent value for money and fast to use.

Brought for my son this tablet is very good. He mainly uses you tube and a few games but he has no complaints. Screen is large and two apps can be opened at the same time in a split screen. Sound is very good. My son has cochlear implants and can hear this tablet well. Battery life is very good and I would recommend this tablet.
Excellent customer service
The price is very good, fast service, but battery life is only 2-3 hours.
Had a Huawei 16 GB T3 tablet and decided to upgrade. Well impressed with this new one and I now use my old tablet for work.
Would certainly recommend this tablet.
This tablet is way better than the others with a big brand names, money and performance wise. It suits well all the demands of my 9 years old boy. It has sharp graphics and good sound.

I recommend it to everyone.

Battery life is ok, it takes a battering from the Granddaughter whom it was purchased for, she loves it, it does everything the more expensive brands do, when it comes to th etime to replace my iPad I wouldn’t hesitate to replace with this brand.
Great size and light to hold.  Got a cover with Bluetooth keyboard.  The Android operating system made it easy to start using it just like my phone!  Perfect!  Very happy with it.

I Bought the Huawei media pad T5 10.1 inch 32GB, about a week ago online, it is a lovely tablet, a lot faster than my previous one was, good value for money, I would recommend it to anyone.
Just what I wanted thank you it is just great.

Smart and versatile piece of technology.  Well packaged on delivery and easy to unpack and deploy. 
Simple to set up and solid to handle. 
Perfect media pad for someone on a budget or looking to try something new.
10 /10 good service argos
Happy with my purchase. I recommend for whoever whats a bargain

Not had it long but everything is good so far, the bigger screen compared to my old Hudl 2 is great, looks and feels good to handle, I'm doing everyday stuff like checking emails, browsing, shopping, downloading the odd app etc, everything done no issues.
Good money, brought to my little son do the homework due to covid-19 outbreak!
very good product suits all purposes

I brought this for my daughter to do school work on during lockdown works great easy for her to use and access everything required and works quickly.  Set up as a child’s device and the parental settings were easy to access as was part of the start up process.

My son is very happy it this tablet.
He can do his homework on this tablet .The screen is big ,that is perfect.

So far so good I bought this for my eight year old as her other lenova tablet had packed in ..The picture and sound quality are excellent...the battery life is good but does take a while to fully charge when flat ..would highly recommend. .
Brilliant fast and easy to use great for gaming
Excellent value for the money. Same controls as the phones so easy to use

Very fast delivery, really happy with the product. Works fast, no delays of any kind. The battery life is kind of short though, and it charges in 5 or 6 hours. Besides that, I am very content with my purchase.
I needed tablet for my daughter so she can learn and play during lockdown
Tablet is fast and good got gaming
Excellent Performance , Good Battery Life , worth it
Bought to replace my wife’s iPad. It is responsive and easy to use. Good memory with added card and battery charge lasts considerably more than her old pad.
Cheap table but does everything our Samsung does but faster

This was a great purchase, a good sized screen  and good value for a middle of the range priced tablet.

Was easy to set up and the battery lasts well without needing to be charged very often.

If you are looking for a reasonably priced tablet, with a lot of memory would recommend this tablet
It's a great price but doesn't feel cheap when you use it. It does everything you would expect. The screen size is perfect. The quality of photos and videos are great! All round good product :)

Great for the price...
Easy to use
Bought for my 10 year old, easy and quick to set up.  Good battery life.

Great product, I find it almost equal to an IPad!

The battery life is good and it is simple and easy to use with a nice clear, crisp screen. 

The only downside would be the plastic casing on the back, however this can be perfected with a sleek case.
Bought for my son for his home learning. Easy to use and set up, great for the price!
Brilliant tablet! Battery life is amazing, screen is a great size, all in all a good product.
I really like this tablet it is great from my little boy 6 years old to do all his school work as we are in lockdown needed somthing bigger than my phone , this is perfect for the family

My 5th huawei product and my 5th of many..
So much more value for money... 
Samsung and apple are way overpriced... 
Does more than you need it to.
Very happy with the product and value for money!
The tablet is 1st class, so easy to use. It is so easy to use and I recommend this product.
none I am very happy with my tablet I bourght it for my granddaughter so I could claim my phone back and it worked

Lovely tablet to hold and use, but the screen resolution means some websites are not displayed correctly and i can't seem to find where to change it. Having 2 Huawei phones in the house i thought i'd be able to find the setting but it doesn't seem to exist. However, for TV viewing it is fantastic, with a nice bright display and reasonably loud speakers.
Brilliant tablet, easy to set up and not much bloatware, superb picture quality and audio is good too. Highly recommend.
Very pleased with the tablet great performance and quality  would recommend buying  and great service from argos
The screen stopped swiping after 48 hours, and as we are in lockdown will need to wait on stores opening so I can return for a refund. Would not recommend this tablet.

I was a little unsure buying this. As I have always had apple products.

How wrong was I. 

Without a doubt this is far superior to the over priced ipad.

Buy it!!! You won't be disappointed.

This tablet does everything required of it. I've been an ipad fan from the beginning but have finally given in and bought something else due to how expensive apple products are. I can totally recommend the Huawei media pad and even my husband a Samsung supporter says how good it is. Easy to control and very quick to respond.
Great Product. Really enjoying it.
So far so good for my 4 & 8 year old. Quite easy to manage. Battery life seems fine but takes a while to charge to full. Would recommend it to those who need it for general everyday use.

Have previously only bought samsung products in the past, but was recommended to try this huawei which had a higher spec that a similar samsung around the same price ..it has been very good so far ..and I would recommend you give it a try
Very easy to set up ready for a birthday present
It's just amazing easy too use
Does everything I want it to, and more. Good value too.
Great service by Argos, I purchased it as a birthday present for my wife. She loves it - easy to use.
First class device for the money. Very clear screen and a fast and responsive piece of tec.
Easy to use would but again xx
Very good and so fast. Worth the money
Great tablet good sharp screen and sound is great
Works welll, Looks Good and is at an affordable price.  Perfect for what I need a tablet for.
Excellent value for for money well worth it
For the price brilliant tablet, transferred all my apps and contacts,gallery from my phone to the tablet in seconds, easy to set up, would by again.
I'm a bit deaf my only gripe not that loud in headphones good ones at that but downloaded volume app all good last had Dolby so that was probably why it was louder
Good price for a well made cheaper tablet. Performance seems good. Still trying so not sure on battery life but looks good. Not a gamer so can’t comment on that use.
Excellent value tablet, good screen quality, responsive, does everything I need it to do for a lot less money than others on the market.
Working perfect nice design and great display graphics i love it beacuse it have memory card slot and android as it os very handy to use and touch quality is also great
Good price. Works very well. Easy to use and setup.
Very clear screen and runs really well. Great purchase.
Working fast nice colours, good tablet for this price
My Tablet is good value for money. I love the sleek design and the on screen graphics, excellent.

This unit performs way better than it should at the price, with a healthy size memory and fast processing. Just the job for streaming, browsing, tinkering with email and documents. Highly recommended.
it took me a while to figure out how t see on sd card but got there
Great very pleased with this item replaced a samsung tablet good price

Bought this to replace an I pad mini. I have to say this performs far better than I expected. Easy to navigate and screen resolution is excellent. Battery life is good. For the price this is a great tablet.

Is good for the price, my child use it for small games and YouTube, it works as the same principle as the huawei phones is like a really big phone which is good specially if you had the phone first the only thing I don't like but is not a big problem are the side buttons that are completely black and hard to spot specifically for a small child.
Overall is a good tablet.

The tablets issleak and light weight. Face recognition works instantly. Touch screen is super responses and the system works really fast.
I would highly recommend this decice. 
Extremely happy with the tablet on the whole.

Purchased as a present for my partner. Very good Media pad. Great camera, all the features you need for a fraction of the price of other similar products. Very impressed so far and she is happy - which is the main thing.

If you're considering using an additional memory card, insert first before you load up apps.
If you don't, the apps won't function correctly....
Great tablet especially for playing games. Browsing social media and watching movies/TV shows.
What amazing value!  Great tablet.
Good device, the only problem is that you are limited to so many apps. The expandable memory doesn't cater for storing apps. Only photos etc.
Very good tablet , does everything I need , brilliant colours , nice  and thin . Everyone at home is loving it !

A great ipad for the money , it does everyone thing you need and I would certainly recommend it to family and friends. 
The only very slight criticism is that the on-off and volume switches on thr side could have been maybe chrome to identify them easier
Bought this as Christmas's present, worth for money and simple applications.

I set up this huwaei tablet for my 87 year old mother. She loves how responsive and clear the big screen is. There have been no issues and she uses it daily. Battery life is far better than the small tablets that this device replaces.

I was looking for a cheap tablet to replace a now obsolete iPad mini.
The screen is a very good size, it's light and the battery lasts a decent amount of time. Perfect for travelling. 
There's hardly any bloatware which was my main goal, and it's the last generation to work with Google play since the ban. All in all, it does exactly what I wanted and so much more.
The only con would be argos don't seem to sell a case for it so you have to go online to find one but mine cost less than £10.

This is a great pad, so happy with it. Can’t believe I could of got such a good pad for the money I spent.
Great specs and performance, especially when compared to other tablets of a similar price.
Great value. Easy to use and set up. Would recommend this product
The 3 Gb RAM has made all the difference. Much faster and more reliable than my previous tablet.

It's a decent tablet for the price, easy to set up for your own preferences....only downside for me...the volume and on/off buttons are located top right..exactly in the place where they are obscured by my case, otherwise it's fine.
I'm very pleased with my tablet. Practical, convenient and fast. It's perfect for my needs
Only down side is when using keyboard you can lose the screen if you type too fast.

Still getting to grips with certain features that differ from previous tablet. Little disappointed I can't view photographs from USB stick - USB port only transfers files FROM tablet  (rather than receive & send) or charge battery.  Also keep accidentally knocking the 'back arrow' navigation bar from view & only way I've found to get it back is to turn off and restart. On a positive note it responds very quickly, keyboard is large enough for someone with bigger fingers to use without a dabber.
It's good, but the bacteria holds little

It's fast easy to understand you will be up and running in minutes, the only down side I've seen with these is the on off button seems to take a bit longer than it should
Do yourself a favour get a case
wife is very happy with it
Bought this for my partner and she loves it. Very fast tablet and luckily bought it when on special offer before it went back to normal price.
Quality product at a superb price point. Worth getting the extra ram on the 32gb version.
Wouldn't buy anything else it's fantastic

Great specifications 32gb storage plus 3gb ram and great processor on paper at least.
I bought this tablet for general browsing and watching videos which it does really well.
But also for gaming and retro games. This where it goes downhill with the specs it should easily run emulators etc but it just can't handle them frame rate is just terrible.
Returned and got Samsung tab a which is much more capable.
For the price this tablet is good value. Quite quick and clear screen. Battery life could be better.
I've bought this product as a gift for my husband, he's using it for games, videos and movies. This tablet is really nice, I'd like to get one for my self
This tablet has excellent picture quality
Great graphics. Really simple and handy. But volume button should be in different color its easy to mistake with power button. And the price is really cool
cannot fault it at all  glad I brought the 32g  as loading all the basic apps leaves you plenty of free space  cant fault Huawei at all 10/10
According to my son (9) it is awesome, really responsive and easy to use. A big thumbs up!
This tablet is nice and big it's hard to get used to the different layout battery runs out fast when playing games which is not good but ok otherwise
Amazing tablet for a reasonable price. Using the brand for 6 years now. Can't say anything bad about it.
Great wee android tablet for my son. He is happy with it and runs great.
This was a Christmas present for my son and he loves it. Good display and great battery life
Fantastic and very sleek looking

Brilliant tablet and a great price. The performance levels are very good seems to do what I ask of it with no trouble at all. Build quality feels very good, very rigid. My step daughter has basically put it through its paces for the last few days using it from gaming to watching media to internet browsing and the tablet does all with no problems .

Great product. I think now I have bought a huawei product I will be buying more of the brand as this item is very good.
This Huawei tablet was purchased to up date an older one, it is much faster and more reliable. As yet it has not been used very long but everything seems to be looking good.

This tablet is better like my old one Samsung tab A 2016.
Rapidity and good design!
I have recommended it to my friends looking for a cheaper tablet.
Definitively worth the money!!!
High in quality, low on the pocket.
My fiancé is so happy receiving this as a present from me for Christmas more than enough storage good size and excellent picture quality great price too
Great Tablet, Fast, Functional
Very nice, very fast, very good
So far so good. For the price it's a fantastic tablet. Quick and good screen for watching Netflix and films

This is a well-engineered tablet that is well-designed except for one major fault. The power button / on/off button is a small black protrusion on a matching black background. It is impossible to find for adults and children alike. Using the tablet requires manipulating it and feeling for the button. Terrible design. We have had to add some sticky tape to highlight the button. It is a shame as it is excellent in all other respects. Definitely not recommended for older users.

This is as good as an ipad, went for 32gb as reviews on 16gb were that the memory wasn't big enough.
Super fast and runs so smoothly screen quality is second to none 10. 1" is massive. 
The eye comfort button is superb it really makes a difference (turns the blue light off that keeps you awake) would recomend for children.
Google play works fine. 
Great price from argos
This tablet is a good product, perfect for kids and adults, very happy with this product and the service of Argos.
Great 5 stars xxxxxx
Would recommend this product, easy to use and easy to transfer all apps from old tablet
Simple to use, comfortable and looking good tablet
Great how it connects to my Huawei phone

I have been looking to replace old tablet for some time, very impressed with this brand, lovely to use, very much faster and more reliable, and plenty of storage. I like everything about this tablet. Been using this for a couple of weeks since purchase, it really is excellent.
Does what it says on the packet
Just like my phone easy to use and clear
Love this mediapad great colours and sound. Quick and easy to use
Great value for money and I couldn’t be more happier that I got it :)

Well made and sturdy. Slim and light weight with a picture/screen quality that's difficult to rival. Excellent product.

Thanks Argos
Very good tablet. Recommended.

It says it supports 256gb of sd card and i have used two cuz one of them had the notification that sd card is faulty so I ordered another sd card and the problem still existed, gonna change it asap. And with sd cards, it's super slow.

Light and easy to use. Good colour definition to the screen. The on-off and volume buttons are not as easy to use as the older version I had but not too serious of a problem that I would not recommend it.

Great price for great tech only down side is the camera is absolute rubbish so if you are buying and are wanting to use the camera FIND ANOTHER TABLET!! But if you want it for games or to watch videos then it's perfect with a good battery life
Value for money and happy with its quality and performance.
Cristal clear looks smart and very responsive
Excellent tablet. I am very happy with Huawei products.
Very pleased with this tablet. Easy to use and set up. Would recommend.

I changed to Huawei when my Samsung failed to connect to the Internet. This was a lot less money but works the same. Actually the key board is slightly easier to see & the screen is slightly larger.
A good android.

Upgrading from old Samsung galaxy tab 8". Huawei tablet is responsive & good quality screen. Using for emails, Web search & Netflix. 10" screen seems lot bigger than old one but my eyes not getting any younger :) happy with it!
Great value and speed for the money. Better than samsung equivalent

It's early days but l am loving my new Huawei media pad.. The price was just right and its working really well.. I brought a stand for mine as it is easier. A lovely Christmas present for anyone this year.. Thank you Argos for the fast transaction and delivery l will be using you again.
Really easy to set up, but battery good until you watch the i player's then it seems battery will go down really quickly, but otherwise very pleased.

Great choice of 10inch tablet. Rivals the competition of Samsung but at an affordable price. As an android platform, it's easy to set up and get it up and running. Highly recommend for a mid range tablet.
Great tablet, Amazing all round!!
Replaced lenovo, no competition significantly superior, bought the phone aswell
Brought this as my first tablet, 3G ram which is good for a tablet so quick loading speeds. Good size screen loads of memory. No complaints.
This is a good all round tablet and my children and I find it easy to use and battery life is good would recommend this compared to the high end products out there.

Nice design and layout.

Functionally easy.

Very happy so far.

And it does say 2 year guarantee which is reassuring.
Excellent service from Argos will not hesitate to buy from them again.
Purchased the Huawei Medi Pad T5 on the spur of the moment, I have a Lenovo tablet, thought I'd try this one. Very happy with my purchase.
Good quality for the price
It's like having a mini 4k TV in your hand the colours and graphics are clear and bright and it runs fast best tablet iv had
Great great great great
performs well, sound and screen quality great, only criticism on/off and volume buttons hard to locate, need to be recessed but a little too much, would I buy again..yes

You get what you pay for. I think for this money is the best tablet you can find.
Its light, its quick and the battery life is way better my previous tablet.
I was not expecting that is going to be so useful and I bought wireless keyboard so its looks like small notebook now
This is an excellent all round tablet.Pretty fast booting up and excellent battery life.Picture quality is fantastic as well. Well worth the money.

Very light - much thinner than the tablet it replaced. Very quick response times and it responds to a very light touch.
Excellent tablet. Good choice for anyone to use.
I used click and collect and found it very easy and much quicker
It is nice and very easy to use for kids
Not had it long but seems like a lot of tablet for the price.
a bit slow on facial recognition and the buttons on the side are placed a bit odd to my taste, but other than that really good for the price !
Nothing to complain about. It work the same as more expensive ones
Great tablet & looks

I was looking to buy 10 inch tablet and found this one the price was cheaper than other brands. It looks and feels well made it comes with most apps already installed plus it has word, excel etc. I had to go on line to get a case to  fit, you can also get a case with keyboard.
Nice product for everyday use.
Good product, will probably discard my laptop now

I wanted an affordable tablet for my wife. My other choice was a Kindle fire. Android version is only 5 in those where as this tablet comes with Android 8, almost vinilla version and Google play store. So free to install any app like zinio without side loading. Also has a good resolution screen and processor with the 3 gigs of ram makes for smooth operation. 32 gigs of memory for storage and apps and I can add further memory with the SD card slot 
Very pleased with this well priced tablet.
Very quick and easy to setup. Access to all Google play store apps. Screen is brilliant and runs everything I have installed without an issue.

Love this tablet starts up quickly and great for watching my shows, can't fault this brilliant tablet. Bought this because I have had a Huawei phone for over 2 years and impressed with Huawei products

I have bought this tablet for my 8 years old and she is loving it. I am leaving this review almost after 6 months since I bought.
It didn't go slow or any other issues.

Recommended for kids and for even for older to watch Netflix or play game.

Pleased with the Huawei MediaPad T5 10.1 Inch 32GB Tablet - Black so far.
Does everything I wanted and a great price.
I m very pleased with the product

Bought this to replace my laptop and I'm thrilled with it. Added a bluetooth keyboard so I can still type quotes and emails and the tablety and the tablet and keyboard both fit in a smart little case. It's fast with a great battery life, brilliant display and just so portable. Top marks!

I wanted a replacement tablet as my old one has seen better days. The Huawei mediaPad T5 certainly fits the bill.  A great 32gb internal memory, with additional sd card slot gives extra memory. It has 3GB Ram which is more than most tablets at this price, and it is so quick.  Graphics are clear, and the speakers are very crisp and good quality. Battery life will give easily 8+ hours working use.  I love this tablet, I have downloaded all my favourite app's, and will be taking it on holiday.

Wow! What a great tablet.It's fast light weight, decent camera.
Looks great, It's up there with the high end ones.
Best tablet I have ever had, better than my last ipad, fast and reliable battery lasts for ages.
Very good, and pleased with this item. Just as good as it’s more expensive competitor.

My first tablet that isn't a fire. Easy to set up. Simple to use. My apps are incredibly easy to install. The screen is clear and video faultless. Sound is much better than I expected. Camera is much better than I thought it would be. My phone is a Sony android so it automatically picks up my calendar etc.
Amazing product and good price .
I've only been using mine for 2 weeks but I'm really pleased with it so far. Fab sound quality, great screen quality, really can't complain for the money.
Happy with purchase good picture and sound battery life is also good would recommend to anyone
Cheap for what it is lock and volume button in annoying place. However has worked well camera not great but it's very fast
It's an absolute steal at £150 and so easy to use.

Great tablet 
Battery life is amazing 
The price makes it a steel 
And it’s just as good as other top end tablets , I prefer it to my I pad it’s so light ! 
Would recommend !
Great mediapad does everything i need apart from make a cup of tea!!
This tablet is excellent value for money. Impressive performance.

Love the tablet 
Good picture quality 
Fast 
Excellent price
This is the sort of tablet that is suitable for all ages.Graphics are fantastic and the sound too. Recomended.
Good functionality and battery life. Easy to use and child friendly.
Good entry level tablet for internet youtube and e-books. Bought it for my grandma
My son really likes this tablet. He is so HAPPY.
The price was right and got no complaints
It does worth more than that price.
Very good tablet, much faster than my old Tab3, only fault I can find with it is the on/off and volume buttons need to be more prominent as I'm always searching for them.
very good product, Wish I had bought it earlier

Very impressive tablet , very pleased with my purchase , bought it to replace tired Lenovo 10.1 I've had a few years , really pleased with the performance . Only downside is the placement of the speakers , they can be covered by your thumbs while holding it , not really that big a deal though .

Tablet looks good and is fast with apps and online, however it took over 6-7 hours to charge everytime. After a few days of having a very disappointed little boy waiting for it to charge, I returned it for the Samsung Tab A 10.1. Argos were great.
Does everything that more expensive Tablets do and cheaper. Excellent Buy. Easy to set up straight from box and connected to the internet without problems.
For the price you pay compaired to the bigger brands its a perfect buy

This tablet is good if you don't play games or download. I got the 32gb and after set up only had 16gb left with 2 basic games. Tried to insert SD card to extend but you can not download to it or move anything on it. So it was not something I could deal with. I took it back for a refund.
in my opinion the best tablet, plenty of space, great sound and picture, amazing quality photo,s

the Huawei tablet is very good, but I have only had it a week, so I cant really
 give a full review ,battery life is good resolution is brill, so it could get a five stars.
This is the best Tablet I have  owned so far and I have  couple of other tablets they don’t match this one I would recommend to buy this one best so far on the market
Good ta let fir my 7 year old cheap and reliable.  Good performance for what u pay for
Really clean design. Easy to set up . Very pleased with my purchase
Neat slim tablet that very user friendly and has great battery life. Brilliant display very clear and user friendly screen set up

The tab is amazing left right and centre. However i am not impressed with the battery backup . The battery drains pretty fast while playing HD videos. 
Also the charger output is pretty low for charging a 5100mah battery. A fast charger or high capacity charger should have been included
Can't complaint so far, good quality, good screen, quite fast, so far so good.
This tablet will do everything I wanted - the only issue I have you cannot alter the resolution so some applications are to big for the screen
Had a Samsung galaxy 10.1 got a bit tired so decided for a new one, got this as it was cheaper and very happy with my choice
We bought it for my mum. Very thin and light and easy to use what was important when i bought

Purchased as a gift for 70 year old! Very easy to set up and get running. Everything seems straightforward, logical and quick. Good on screen colours and the recipient likes how lightweight it is to hold. So far seems a good buy but time will tell!

This tablet sits in the mid-range of the tablet spectrum, but I think it represents good value for money.
Plus: 
- full HD screen suitable for all non-super fussy users,
- good and loud speakers - plenty of volume for kids to watch while you driving,
- good battery
- the metal body gives you a bit of premium feel
Minus:
- the screen is a magnet for fingerprints.
Worth of your money.

Had this a couple of weeks now and have not managed to find no issues with it,
Its fast and the screen is nice and sharp and the colors are nice a vibrant...... The battery is lasting about 10 hours so if your just using it for a few hours a day then a couple of charges a week will be all it needs,
Its currently running on android 8 but after some reading up its due an update to android 9 very soon,
Worth a buy if your after a nice spec tablet without a huge price tag.
Good value for the price. Much better than expected, only issue is that you can't install apps on external storage I. E. Sd card.
Works well. Good size.
A BIT EXPENSIVE BUT A QUALITY BRAND I PAID EXTRA TO GET A BETTER QUALITY PRODUCT SO HOPEFULLY I WILL HAVE 12 MONTH USE WITHOUT THE PRODUCT FAILING...
Very good tablet and excellent value with great graphics and fast processors and good memory too but get 32gb much better
Good one to have; sleek design
Good price for this tablet.works very good.Thank you.
Haven't had this tablet for long but happy so far. Battery seems good, clear screen and decent sound quality. I'm confident in Huawei brand as I've had there products before
It worked fine as a tablet, but there was a focus problem on the first one I got. Argos replaced. There was a colour problem on the replacement. Took It back and got a full credit.

Thoroughly recommended for those who want good performance and decent amount of storage for lower cost. At this range you won't find a better tablet. The Samsung equivalent is the Tab A and this tablet completely out performs that tablet and others.
Perfect for work, battery life isn't great though, runs down quite fast
Easy to set up from other Android device.
A good solid performer nice and slim easy to use and a clear view screen I recommend. Ian Mingay

Re ; Huawei Tablet.      Very pleased with my purchase..   It is  a much improved  tablet compared to my last one, which is years old.  It is quicker , easier, clearer   and so nice to use. Excellent service from Argos.. 10 out of 10.

Excellent Tablet does everything you want it to do

Excellent tablet and recommend highly.
Does everything and more I need it to.
